title: Marvel Premiere #15
description: Iron Fist’s first appearance! Meet Marvel’s resident Kung Fu hero, the mystical One of K’un-Lun, the Immortal Iron Fist! Mentor Yu-Ti recalls the origin of Daniel Rand, a young boy born far outside the mystic heights of K’un-Lun. Tragedy begets one of Marvel’s mightiest heroes.
author: Roy Thomas
